text: Ismat Ahmed Chowdhury is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Habiganj-1. He was the organizer of the Liberation War of Bangladesh. ==Career== Chowdhury fought in the Bangladesh Liberation war. He was elected to parliament from Habiganj-1 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1986. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Mukti Bahini personnel Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Nabiganj Upazila
title: Ismat Ahmed Chowdhury
